title: On Fishing: Modified Didot-like font
content:
Can anyone identify the base font that was modified for this book cover design? The lower case a seems peculiar to me.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233528im_/http:/typophile.com/files/on-fishing_6214.jpg)
author: xensen

comments.content: Those really look like [Marian Bantjes](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233528/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Marian%20Bantjes)-like tendrils attached to a fairly manipulated (and mildly, albeit eleglant enough, tortured) Bodoni.
Thank you, Miss Tiffany. I like the swashes and the concept, but I'm not so keen on how they attach to, for example, the B and the C.
Tom, I'm sorry I can get you a better ID. Maybe bumping it will help.
